subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Orange Coach Jim Boeheim, who is entering his 34th season at his alma mater, lost his top three scorers from last season’s 28-10 team.
snippet: Orange Coach Jim Boeheim, who is entering his 34th season at his alma mater, lost his top three scorers from last season’s 28-10 team.
